title: Automatic termination in case of failed launches

content.raw:
When a constellation fails to launch, some AWS resources are not released automatically.

This can happen for a variety of reasons:
* instance capacity limits at AWS
* instance limits in the account (for machine types)
* other limits (nb of VPCs, elastic Ips, ...)

Running the terminate automatically works, but it publishes messages that hide the problem. A "silent" terminate should be implemented, or error messages could be placed somewhere.
